] {Tritium};

color={rgb,1:red,0.00000000;green,0.00000000;blue,0.00000000}, draw opacity=1.0,
rotate=0.0
] {Deuterium};
\node at (axis cs:0, 0) [,
color={rgb,1:red,0.00000000;green,0.00000000;blue,0.00000000}, draw opacity=1.0,
rotate=0.0
] {+17.6 MeV};
\node at (axis cs:10.25, -2) [,
color={rgb,1:red,0.00000000;green,0.00000000;blue,0.00000000}, draw opacity=1.0,
rotate=0.0
] {Helium};
\end{axis}

\end{tikzpicture}
